channel.title: The server blah,blah is offline, it must be online before you can register
channel.description: wtf??? why wont mopar let me post it on there? i portfowarded made a no-ip ??? i dnt get it someone plkease help :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: The server blah,blah is offline, it must be online before you can register
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

We don’t help with the server status page, there is nothing we can do about it.

If the page says it is offline, that means it is not accessible from the internet.

Read full topic

item.title: The server blah,blah is offline, it must be online before you can register
item.dc:creator: @KrisGreen KrisGreen
item.description:
@KrisGreen wrote:

im almost positive that mopar doesnt do half of what it says many people have complained about posting there server and it not comming up, it happened to me too so i would just wait for it to come up if not try posting it on other advertising sites

Read full topic
item.source: The server blah,blah is offline, it must be online before you can register

item.title: The server blah,blah is offline, it must be online before you can register
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Well it gotta be something that is blocking like a anti-virus or something.

Did you forward the ports on TCP?
If so try to port forward them on “TCP/UDP”
And in the firewall exceptions add the port 43594 on TCP
Then add another port which is the same one 43594 but this time on UDP
So now you have added exceptions on your firewall!

Read full topic
item.source: The server blah,blah is offline, it must be online before you can register

item.title: The server blah,blah is offline, it must be online before you can register
item.dc:creator: @i_str8merk_i i str8merk i
item.description:
@i_str8merk_i wrote:

okay i did all that and my friend got on my server so it obviously isnt my portfowarding and i did the firewall thing so wtf is it???[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:4, topic:322697”]Dude look let your friend or someone whos not in the same house as yours try to connect to your server and that will give you the answer if you have port-forwarded correctly

I advise you to look at your firewall and turn it off
and then go to exceptions and add the port “43594”[/quote]

Read full topic
